profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as developing cloud-native backends, implementing data processing algorithms, and code reviews. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The only technology mentioned is AWS, a cloud platform, which supports general software development. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about its focus on backend development and cloud-native patterns, and explicitly states what the role will NOT be doing, which helps in excluding AI/ML specific responsibilities. There is no ambiguity regarding the core tasks.
